author: Shiv Sahay Singh
text:
The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) on Monday filed the sixth supplementary charge sheet in a case involving the Saradha scam accused.

In the charge sheet, estranged wife of former Union Minister Matang Sinh, Manoranjana, has been mentioned as accused for the first time.

Manoranjana Sinh, along with Saradha CMD Sudipta Sen and industrialist Santanu Ghosh, has been booked for cheating and criminal conspiracy. Manoranjana Sinh’s company GNN India and Santanu Ghosh’s Global Automobile have been named in the charge sheet.

The charge sheet makes references to Nalini Chidambaram, the wife of former Union Minister P. Chidambaram, as having represented the Sinhs in the case.
title: Sixth charge sheet in Saradha case
